Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Punchline: Show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status
Description: This plugin allows you to show your zone, job, level, name, and world in your Discord status.
Changelog: Updated dependencies. Might help with some recent connection failures.

Author: perchbird
Name: Housemate
Punchline: Displays information about housing fixtures and objects.
Description:
Housemate offers multiple features that help you gain inspiration from other homes in XIV.
If you're looking for a specific home or outdoor item, you can check the exterior list
when running around a ward. If you're interested in seeing what items make up a
structure in a home - turn on the item overlay to see what they are!

Note: This plugin is purely informational, and does not assist you in placing
or "glitching" housing items.

Author: Vielle Janlenoux
Name: Snooper
Punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.
Description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Changelog:
* Updated for Dalamud 7.
* It is now possible to open additional, sticky Snooper windows for specific players or groups of players, independent of current target. To do so, click "New window for this target" in the main Snooper window.
* By default, the main Snooper window now shows chat history on mouse-over without the need to target, and displays target chat history when the mouse is not over a player. (Can be disabled in settings.)
* By default, when the target posts a message while the Snooper window is visible, a sound alert is now played. (Can be disabled in settings.)

Author: attick & perchbird
Name: Title Edit
Punchline: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens for FFXIV.
Description:
Create your own custom title screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title screens for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to
use title screens that others have shared!

Author: ascclemens
Name: Burnt Toast
Punchline: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.
Description: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.
Changelog: API 7

Author: Xorus
Name: EngageTimer
Punchline: Complete combat countdown, pull timer and OBS overlay
Description:
Finally, display all the numbers when starting a countdown!
Comes with an accurate pull timer that starts when you or any of your party members enter combat.

Features :
- Big countdown that displays all the numbers
- Customizable big-number textures (default, yellow, WoW style or custom files)
- Display combat time in the Server Info Bar, and/or a floating window
- OBS browser-source compatible page with countdown and current combat duration

Why the OBS thing ? Well, it can be useful if you want a big stylized stopwatch in your recordings.
See repository for more info.

Feel free so send me feedback, bugs and potential improvements!
Changelog: - Floating Window: the `:` separator in the stopwatch has gone back from their vacation

Author: Attick
Name: XIV Combo
Punchline: PvP, but in PvE!
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu
Changelog: fixed arcane circle combo

Author: perchbird
Name: ResLogger2.Plugin
Punchline: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.
Description:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Note that the current database of found paths can
be downloaded at any time at https://rl2.perchbird.dev/export.csv.

Author: Tischel
Name: Inventory Search Bar
Punchline: Adds a search bar directly in the inventory window to filter items.
Description:
Supports different types of filters to be able to find items by name, type, supported job or level requirements.

Supported Inventories:

	- Chocobo Saddlebags
	- Retainer Inventory
	- Armoury
Changelog: - Fixed search bar with an active search disappearing when switching tabs.

This plugin adds a new option when right-clicking an item from the Housing Menu that targets the item for you, saving you a lot of trouble.

Author: Nadya
Name: Tidy Chat
Punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.
Description:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
Changelog: Updated for 6.2

Author: daemitus

Author: Caraxi
Name: Macro Chain
Punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other.
Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro' but this command cannot be used while macros are running.

Author: ocealot
Name: EasyEyes
Punchline: Hide annoying or distracting VFXs
Description: A plugin which can hide any VFX. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: Kouzukii
Name: Which Patch Was That?
Punchline: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!

Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
Changelog: Add new items from 6.25

Author: Rietty
Name: AutoMammet
Punchline: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets.
Description: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets. Provides options to export the popularity, future popularity and the current cycle's supply and demand shift values. Both as words and as numbers on a scale of -2 to 2. This plugin does not provide any calculations for Island Sanctuary, merely an export option for your ingame data. Information is exported to your clipboard, so you can paste into any other program.
Changelog: Updated some wording to be more clear where information is exported to.

Author: Infi
Name: Death Roll Helper
Punchline: Plugin to help with a number of /random and /dice related games.
Description:
Plugin to help with several /random and /dice-related games.

Venue:
    + Concise display of all concurrent players in a list-based format
    + Supports multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
DeathRoll:
    + Supports multiple players
    + Automatic checks to prevent number skipping
Tournament (1v1 DeathRoll):
    + Automatic bracket generation with byes to fill uneven
    + Forfeit functionality if a player needs to leave
Blackjack:
    + Automatic reward calculation based on common rules
    + Simplistic, or visual view of cards in play
    + Automatic or manual player-based draw for cards
    + Current players can be seamlessly moved to subsequent rounds
    + Configurable dealer rules (like Soft16)

Extra Features:
    + Block or prevent players from partaking in any game
    + Accept only /random or /dice commands

More features are planned, following user feedback.
Changelog: + Fix regex not working for some display name types

Author: Helios
Name: Adaptive Hud
Punchline: Switches your /hudlayout when your game switches from windowed to fullscreen.
Description:
Useful for ultrawide users, swapping from windowed/fullscreen will automatically switch your hudlayout.

Author: Infi
Name: Better Playtime
Punchline: Ever wanted detailed information on your playtime all the way down to the second?
Description:
Provides expanded functionality to seamlessly track total playtime.
      Requires only using /playtime once on each character (again to refresh the time),

      - Supports multiple characters,
      - Customisable output formats such as hours or minutes
      - Automatic playtime tracking after character got registered
      - Simple window to see current session playtime
      - Server Info Bar integration
Changelog:
+ Prevent round up of hours and days
+ Add config tab for character deletion
+ Extend server bar integration

Author: MidoriKami
Name: Daily Duty
Punchline: Easily Track Daily and Weekly tasks.
Description: Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Punchline: Extra job gauges
Description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN

Author: kalilistic
Name: Kapture
Punchline: Track your loot.
Description:
Kapture is a loot tracker to capture drops, obtained items, rolls, and more.
Use the roll monitor to see who you are waiting on to roll.

- Added configuration options to override configuration for specific zones.
- Added text commands("/saywhat ban" and "/saywhat unban") to override settings for the current zone.  These are just simplified toggles for new the settings in the config window.

Author: goat
Name: Ultrawide Cutscenes
Punchline: Remove letterboxing from cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.
Description:
This plugin removes the "letterboxing" bars when watching cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.
Beware! You may see things that you are not supposed to be seeing, such as upcoming NPCs popping in or T-posing.

Thanks to aers for finding this.

Author: Pilzinsel64, r00telement
Name: Player Tags
Punchline: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.
Description:
Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
Changelog:
Version 1.8.1
- Fixed option "Target Chat Type" not working
- Updated translation files

Version 1.8
Hello everyone!
This update has a few new feature (such job icons, chat type selection) and some other changes.

First of all, thanks to everyone using Player Tags, everyone that helped me when I had dummy questions, thanks to the creator of Party Icons who allowed me to reuse some logic from his Plugin for the new library combined with code from Player Tags, and also thanks to r00telement (the original creator of this plugin) for the brilliant idea and for the creation.

Now, let's come to this update...
There has been moved some code to a separated library in another repository for general use for everyone. There are more plans for that library especially for the nameplate features. Also, everyone is free to review it and add his own codes via PRs.

- New features:
    - Tags: Added Job Icons
        - Choose what icon set you want to use
        - This is the first version of it, like you may know from Party Icons, that replaces the status icon.
        - By default there are some settings for priorizing status icons over job icons (you can edit them in the settings)
        - The plan for the future is to extend that feature and implement the ability to add a second icon beside the status icon.
    - Tags: Added Tag configuration templates
    - Tags: Choose for what chat type the Tag should applied to
    - General: Gray out or completely ignore Tags for dead players
        - If you see the Nameplate not getting tray instantly, it's because I can't tell the game to update the nampelate. The Game decides itself when it's time for. :/
- Other:
    - A lot minor adjustments and fixes, i don't remember yet
- Under the hood:
    - Use new config file at "\pluginConfig\Player Tags\Config.json" (with auto migration)
    - Move a lot of code more standardised to a library (available on GitHub)

There are new Strings that are waiting for translation. Feel free to help!

Wish you all a good start to the new, enjoy it!

Author: MgAl2O4
Name: Harp Hero
Punchline: Bard performance assistant
Description:
Assist mode for bards who want to play music but don't know how to.
- does NOT play anything automatically
- needs MIDI files to work
- adapts MIDI tracks to fit in game limitations for you
- you will be scored :O

Author: karashiiro

Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.

Description: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.
Changelog: - Reenabled the preset editor, which now includes a warning message about out of bounds waymarks.

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Punchline: Customizable ImGui hotbars
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Author: lokinmodar
Name: Echoglossian
Punchline:
Dialogue and other in-game text translations? Yes we have!
Known Issues at: https://github.com/lokinmodar/Echoglossian/issues/12

Changelog: Fixed for patch 6.2!

Author: perchbird
Name: PrefPro
Punchline: Changes in-game dialogue to reference your desired gender and name.
Description:
Your character is personal, so you should be able to have NPCs refer to them
the way that you want. With PrefPro, you can control which text option
will appear when an NPC uses dialogue meant for a specific in-game gender.
This allows you to use a female player model and be referred to as male, and
vice versa. In addition, there are a few name customization options - if you
want to only be referred to by your last name, so be it.
Note: This plugin currently will not swap voiced cutscene dialogue.

Reverse-engineering effort achieved by authors of JobIcons: haplo, daemitus, Loskh, wozaiha, without them this plugin would not be possible!

- Changed the display name of the plugin to improve discoverability.
- Fixed errors in log when in hunt train as SCH or SMN with pet out.

Author: WildWolf
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Punchline: Live monster data for Deep Dungeons.
Description: A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon. Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics. Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played. Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data. Original by Strati

### 1.9.2 (2022-11-03)

Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Instant friend login & logout notifications in-game between GoodFriend users.
Description:
A client to communicate with any GoodFriend-Compatible API to send & receive notifications when your friends login and logout of the game (as long as they are using this plugin & are connected to the same instance).

Features:
- Privacy-focused in design, all data is completely anonymized before leaving your machine.
- Support for "friend codes" to only receive and send notifications with others who share the same code.
- Customizable login & logout messages
- Basic & Bearer authentication support
- Can show notifications in chat, as a toast, or as a pop-up
- & more.
Changelog:
- Added the ability to filter the event log by log level
- Various PluginLog level changes
- Server-side optimizations & dependancy updates

Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Punchline: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices
Description:
Plugin for simplifying "pennying" (undercutting current lowest offer by 1).

The usual workflow for this is the following:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Take a mental note of what the current lowest offer is
4. Subtract one from it
5. Close the current listings window
6. Update your item's price with the number you noted
7. Confirm your new price

This plugin eliminates the mental notekeeping steps in the middle by automatically copying the number you want onto your clipboard when you open the current listings window.  

Therefore, your new workflow becomes this:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Close the current listings window
4. Paste the undercut value in
5. Confirm your new price

This both speeds up the process and reduces room for error from typos.
Changelog: .NET 6 update

Author: Marethyu
Name: Where's my mouse

Add UI element on top of the mouse like circle to keep track of your mouse location during gameplay.
Open settings with /wmm

- Adds ability to automatically pop NMs in the Eureka Tracker
- Adds ability to display chat notification when NM appears

Author: Sevii

Punchline: Furniture selection that actually works properly
Description: An improved housing experience. Furniture selection based on what you see, keybinds to switch modes and toggle counter and snap.

- Add keybinds to switch mode, toggle counter placement, and grid snap
- Support animated furniture (doors, other things that move)
- Finally update to 6.2

Author: mkalash
Name: Vanilla Hotbar Extender
Punchline: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.
Description: Allows you to use commands to save the actions in a hotbar and then load them into any other hotbar. Like the vanilla "/hotbar copy" command, but unlimited, without taking up other hotbars to save the actions.
Changelog:
1
 -First release

Author: Bluefissure

Name: Party List Layout

Author: BitsOfAByte

Punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for sprouts & doing your daily roulettes!
Description:
Comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids.

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat user interface that scales well at small sizes
- A short-text mode for easier reading & accessibility
- Anti-spoiler protections by default
- Built-in guide editor
- Integrations with your favourite plugins
& more to come!
Changelog:
New Features:
- Add 'notes' to guides
- Add better separation between sections
Bug Fixes:
- Properly dispose of Wotsit IPC

- Export and import layouts from text

Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering. Think OverlayPlugin, but it's in the game itself.
Use the settings button below or the '/bh config' command to configure.
Changelog: Fixes an issue wherein under certain circumstances, integrated browser rendering libraries would be removed.

Author: goat

The intelligent voice assistant for your FFXIV experience - teleport to places, open other plugins, the possibilities are limitless!

Author: XIV Tools
Name: Fullscreen Toggle
Punchline: Enter and leave borderless windowed mode quickly!
Description: Enter and leave borderless windowed mode quickly! Press Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.
Changelog:
a plugin that listens for the Alt+Enter key combination and toggles game window between normal and borderless fullscreen mode.

NOTE: this does not change the game settings in any way, it just uses the windows API to maximize/restore the window and hide/show the titlebar and border.

https://github.com/XIV-Tools/FullscreenToggle

Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

This indicator is in the item's description near the bottom and only appears for
items that are unlockable, such as orchestrion rolls, minions, etc.

Square Enix say this plugin is impossible!

Icon: Server by Vectorstall from the Noun Project

Author: Left

Simple plugin to be used in conjunction with ACT to automatically echo 'end' at the end of combat to end an encounter. 

Also adds optional reminder to reset encounter data when entering a duty.

Author: Kaz Wolfe
Name: BatteryGauge
Punchline: Keep track of your FFXIV device's battery.
Description:
Hey, you! Yes, you! Do you play FFXIV on your laptop? Or are you so addicted to FFXIV that you have a UPS on your desktop just so you can keep playing through power outages? Then this is the plugin for you!

BatteryGauge adds a battery indicator to your server info bar showing your current battery percentage and expected remaining lifespan (as reported by Windows).

New Character Data Synchronization plugin without using native hooks.

Be sure to make backups before testing this plugin. While I tested and made sure the basic functionality works, I cannot cover every case and different configurations we may have. Therefore caution is advised.

This work is based from the original CharacterSync by goat.
